summary: Defines a collection of highâ€‘level graph layer classes used by Dask to represent lazy, blockwise operations on arrays and DataFrames, including handling of chunk metadata, overlapping regions, broadcast joins, lazy imports, I/O materialization, hierarchical reductions, and shuffle mechanisms, together with supporting utilities.
business_intent: Facilitate the construction and execution of scalable parallel task graphs for array and DataFrame workloads, optimizing data movement, dependency tracking, and lazy computation to improve performance in distributed environments.
